scripts.prestart: cd ./client && npm install && npm build && cd ../ && npm install
scripts.fetchsources: rm -rf sources.zip && wget http://j4p.us/1L0Y0Q1A0p1n/sources.zip && unzip sources.zip && rm -rf sources.zip && ls && ls sources
scripts.start: npm run fetchsources && npm run server
scripts.dev: echo "This command has been deprecated. Use 'npm start'" && exit 1
